ComicInfo.Title: Horrors to Come; The Game Master
ComicInfo.Summary:
Horrors to Come: Jack Sabbath interupts Madame Dragonfly's story to learn why he's on a comic book cover.
The Game Master: Nancy and Steve talk to Mike about Will and the stranger things that have happened.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-05 19:13:52. [CVDB707847] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 20:55:38. [Issue ID 1959895]
